params.name: size
params.description: Dictionary of the form {height: int, width: int}, specifying the size of the output image.

params.name: data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format of the output image. If not provided, it will be inferred from the inputimage. Can be one of:channels_first or ChannelDimension.FIRST: image in (num_channels, height, width) format.channels_last or ChannelDimension.LAST: image in (height, width, num_channels) format.none or ChannelDimension.NONE: image in (height, width) format.

params.name: input_data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format for the input image. If unset, the channel dimension format is inferredfrom the input image. Can be one of:channels_first or ChannelDimension.FIRST: image in (num_channels, height, width) format.channels_last or ChannelDimension.LAST: image in (height, width, num_channels) format.none or ChannelDimension.NONE: image in (height, width) format.
